title: Intro to Computer Science
description: Learn the fundamentals of computer science.

title: Calculus I
description: Differential and integral calculus of one variable.

title: Data Structures
description: Explore common data structures like arrays, linked lists, and trees.

title: Algorithms
description: Learn algorithm design and analysis techniques.

title: Discrete Mathematics
description: Logic, set theory, combinatorics, and graph theory.

title: Operating Systems
description: Concepts in modern operating systems like memory, processes, and file systems.

title: Computer Networks
description: Foundations of data communication and networking protocols.

title: Databases
description: Relational databases, SQL, and database design.
